```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(fig.path = "", comment = "")

knitr::knit_hooks$set(
  plot = function(x, options) {
    hugoopts <- options$hugoopts
    paste0(
      "{{<figure src=",
      '"', x, '" ',
      if (!is.null(hugoopts)) {
        glue::glue_collapse(
          glue::glue('{names(hugoopts)}="{hugoopts}"'),
          sep = " "
        )
      },
      ">}}\n"
    )
  }
)
library("RefManageR")

mybib <- ReadBib("refs.bib", check = FALSE) 

cite <- function(key, bib = mybib) {
  RefManageR::NoCite(bib, key)
  paste0("[^", key, "]")
}
```

```{r bib, echo = FALSE, results = "asis"}
lala <- capture.output(RefManageR::PrintBibliography(mybib, .opts = list(bib.style = "draft")))
lala[lala==""] <- "\n"
lala <- glue::glue_collapse(lala, sep = " ")
lala <- gsub("  ", " ", lala)
lala <- unlist(strsplit(lala, "\n"))
lala <- sub(
  "\\*", "]:",
  sub(
    "\\*", "[^",
    lala
  )
)
glue::glue_collapse(lala, sep = "\n")

```
